review_data.title: Hidden gem

review_data.title: Value for money

review_data.title: Nice Indian dinner at Kobal.

review_data.title: Indian and more

review_data.title: top indian, super friendly
review_data.content: Kobal is an all time favourite for good, modern Indian food in Zurich. Its an intimate, cozy place and the people who work there are always friendly and very accommodating. highly recommended.

review_data.title: Fusion of a relaxed Zurich and delicious indian food
review_data.content: Fusion of a relaxed Zurich and delicious indian food, fair price, generous portions, easy place, very relaxed ambience.

review_data.title: Great variations of Doshas!
review_data.content: Very nice variation of Doshas. You do not get Doshas often in Europe, but this place is specialized and has a whole variation of it. Nice place to hang out with a beer and eat good food. Also not too costly.

review_data.title: My favorite dinner place in Zurich!
